text: Pocket God is a video game application for the iPhone, iPod and iPad. It is a game containing small people that live on an island. The gamer can put the islanders through tasks and games. Category:2009 video games Category:Android (operating system) games Category:Facebook games Category:God games Category:IOS games Category:Mobile games Category:Single-player video games Category:Video games developed in the United States
title: Pocket God
